Data on a group of college students diagnosed with dyslexia

Data for Exercise 2.90

Dyslexia

Format

A data frame with 8 observations on the following seven variables.

words
number of words read per minute
age
age of participant
gender
a factor with levels female and male
handed
a factor with levels left and right
weight
weight of participant (in pounds)
height
height of participant (in inches)
children
number of children in family

References

Kitchens, L. J. (2003) Basic Statistics and Data Analysis. Duxbury

Examples


str(Dyslexia)
#> 'data.frame':	8 obs. of  7 variables:
#>  $ words   : int  165 201 75 124 105 143 126 92
#>  $ age     : int  21 18 19 19 20 18 19 20
#>  $ gender  : Factor w/ 2 levels "female","male": 2 1 1 2 1 2 2 2
#>  $ handed  : Factor w/ 2 levels "left","right": 1 2 2 2 1 2 1 2
#>  $ weight  : int  165 115 138 187 100 210 178 155
#>  $ height  : int  70 66 65 72 61 71 69 68
#>  $ children: int  2 1 4 3 2 1 1 3
plot(height ~ weight, data = Dyslexia)
plot(words ~ handed, data = Dyslexia)
